org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.dbviews.base

Class AbstractDBViewRoot<T extends AbstractTableDBView>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.dbviews.base.AbstractDBViewRoot<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The view type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentsDBViewRoot, BatchDBViewRoot, CategoricalMetadataDBViewRoot, DatasetDBViewRoot, ExperimentDBViewRoot, NumericalMetadataDBViewRoot, ResultDBViewRoot, TestDBViewRoot, UsersDBViewRoot

    public abstract class AbstractDBViewRoot<T extends AbstractTableDBView>
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for DB views used in DB tables. Provides GUI configuration for the view like column sizes etc.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl

      • approveAction

        public abstract void approveAction(ITableColumn column,
                 AbstractTableRowDBView row,
                 java.lang.Runnable action)
        This method is called after the user clicks a button within a cell in DBTable. It is a top-level check whether the button's action handler may be executed for the given row.
